hero.title: Fair Price Supply
hero.subtitle: Thailand's trusted partner for hotel linens, amenities, and hospitality essentials.

story.heading: Our Story
content: Founded in 2018, Fair Price Supply began as a small, passionate team focused on solving real problems for hotels and resorts. Today, we're proud to partner with over 200 hospitality businesses across Thailand, providing quality linens, amenities, and essentials they can rely on.
We didn't just start a businessâ€”we built a mission: to make premium hospitality supplies accessible, reliable, and affordable for every property, from boutique resorts to large hotel chains.

visionAndMission.heading: Vision & Mission
visionAndMission.vision: To be Thailand's leading provider of hospitality supplies, empowering our clients to deliver outstanding guest experiences.
visionAndMission.mission: We build long-term relationships based on trust, integrity, and measurable results.

values.label: Customer First
values.text: Success of our clients drives everything we do

values.label: Integrity
values.text: Transparency and honesty in all dealings

values.label: Teamwork
values.text: Respect and collaboration across all levels

values.label: Excellence
values.text: High standards in quality and service
